name: Munchter
description:
Eat the things which are smaller than you but avoid the things which are the same size or larger. As you eat things you will grow from a tiny cell into an eater of worlds!

Originally created for the low res jam last year. The challenge was to create a game in a 32x32 pixel window and this was the game I came up with.

Controls
WASD - Move
Space - Advance Menus
P - Pause Game

Known Bugs
Weird pixel problems at some resolutions.
